Private contract of purchase and sale of establishment and brands

I, the undersigned, Urbano José Afonso, declare that I have justly contracted with Senhor Julião Castro the sale of my estancia establishment, located on the coast of Canhitas, with one and a half leagues of land more or less, in the department of Salto, in the Estado Oriental, with all cattle, horses, mules and any others that may be considered my property, existing on the land of which I am possessed, under the conditions mentioned below:

- From today onward Senhor Julião Castro shall be the buyer, owner, and possessor of the brands belonging to my establishment and my property here and anywhere any animal belonging to said brands may be found, under the security of the sale I have made to him.
- That, I, as seller and resident in Brazil, shall have the right and faculty to recruit the animals belonging to said brands existing in the province of Rio Grande do Sul, for a period of six months, and rebrand them; and if I do not comply, upon expiration of said term, I shall lose this right.
- That the brands I sell are the following, namely: my own property and that of my son Antônio José Afonso, I being responsible for my son's brand in case of any doubt thereof.
- That the sale of the brands and all animals belonging to them was agreed upon for eight hundred silver pesos, Senhor Julião Castro, as buyer, undertaking to make the first payment on sight in the amount of four hundred and twenty-three pesos, which I have already received upon making this, and three hundred and seventy-seven pesos in five months, by a promissory note signed by him for said term.
- That if by chance the buyer Julião Castro has occasion to make any use of cattle by selling them for the charqueada or to any other place understood to have the same purpose, he shall be obliged—except for the term I give him—to fulfill the said payment, even if the said term is not yet due.
- The buyer Julião Castro is obliged to strictly comply with the provisions mentioned below, namely: to deliver to me or my order six mules branded or above, as well as twelve mares in the same condition, whenever I or my order request them; as well as six colts, including one bay dun shepherd; and he shall also deliver by my order, which I reserve, the following: to D. Nazário Verão four male cattle; to D. Valdomiro Sousa two of the said; to Manuel Moreira de Miranda one colt; to D. Filipe Rodrigues one idem; as well as to D. Maria Moreira da Silva one bay oveiro colt, from the herd of the known Baios.
- That from today onward, I, as seller, lose the right to the property which by this agreement I sell to Senhor Julião Castro, he remaining obliged to answer with his person and goods now or in the future, for the prompt payment and execution of the said, as well as I to make the sale firm and valuable to him, both in court and outside of it, notwithstanding third parties.

Having thus justly contracted, we draw up two documents of this same tenor and in all equal, to which we give the same force and vigor as if it were a public deed, and for the certainty of truth we sign with the witnesses declared below.

Done in Arapey Chico, on September 18, 1848.

Urbano José Afonso  
Julião Castro  
As witnesses: Manuel Ferreira Bica  
Justino Bernardes de Castro  
As witness that I made and signed this: Manuel Moreira de Miranda
